AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

MultiFeature.Name: Legacy of Dis
MultiFeature.Text: You know the thaumaturgy cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the disguise self spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the invisibility spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
